name: Crash & Collect
description:
Collect as many items, and cause as much damage and chaos as you can by crashing into shelves. Just be sure to get to the exit by closing time.

Made in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 gamejam.

FEATURES
  • Fully physical characters and shopping trolley.
  • Plenty of passersby to crash.
  • Destructible shelves.
  • Mess up the place and enjoy the chaos.
CONTROLS

(Note: This game can be played with mouse and keyboard, but is best experienced with a gamepad controller)

Move

Gamepad (L Joystick)

WASD / arrow keys

Move Camera

Gamepad (R Joystick)

Move Mouse

Accelerate

Gamepad (RT / RB)

Spacebar

Break

Gamepad (LT / LB)

Left Shift
